channel.title: Video games on Kubernesto
channel.description: Recent content in Video games on Kubernesto

item.title: My top ten video games of all time
item.description: For the past few months, I have been writing mostly about productivity. And that’s fine since it is one of the things I am more passionate about. But since the first of January, I also have been writing a productivity newsletter in Spanish every weekday. So I wanted to take a break from this blog about that subject. This means I am going to talk about my other passion: video games (Nintendo ones, mostly).
